Text: If you like the music, please buy the CD when you can.
If I knew where to buy it, I totally would. This is one of the best soundtracks for an anime I've heard in a very long time. Any idea of a website that has it for order?

You can purchase this soundtrack from a number of places.

PlayAsia and CD Japan are both large trusted sites. Simply google them and this soundtrack, you'll find where you can purchase it.

Very much worth it.
I intend to buy it but, right now I don't have the extra.
